channel.title: Disconnection Error PI Erasedpkz
channel.description:
Hey guys, so I'm using Pi Erasedpkz, and basically when I log into my server, it all works great. However, once I log out, and then try and log in, it displays this error: [url=http://prntscr.com/l4i7e]Error[/url]
I have to restart the server completely to fix it, If i close and reopen my client it does not fix it. Even restarting my computer does not fix it. Any ideas?
I should note, it only happens on my beta server.
